headline: Dividend Stock Portfolio Strategy: The Role of Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL)
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is included among the Best Retirement Stocks for a Dividend Stock Portfolio. Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is a major name in the consumer goods industry, offering products in oral care, personal care, home care, and pet nutrition. Its well-known brands include Colgate toothpaste and Hill’s Science Diet pet food, which have helped secure […]
